Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the opening goal 10 minutes in
Jamal Musiala doubled Germany's lead with an emphatic finish
Kai Havertz converted the resulting penalty after Ryan Porteous was sent off
Niclas Füllkrug powered in a fourth goal midway through the second half
Antonio Rüdiger inadvertently scored an own goal three minutes from time
Emre Can added a fifth goal with the final kick of the game
Pre-Game Insights: Germany's first men's major tournament as hosts since the 2006 World Cup
Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann expressed his players' hunger to atone for recent failures
Steve Clarke urged Scotland to 'fear no one' ahead of their upcoming games
Scotland arrived in Munich with only one win from their past nine matches
Post-Match Reflections: Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann praised his team's performance
Scottish coach Steve Clarke will need to regroup quickly for upcoming games
Toni Kroos will retire after the tournament
This marked Germany's first major tournament as hosts since the 2006 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angus Gunn made an alert save from an offside Wirtz
Scotland conceded the third goal from the spot following a VAR review
Niclas Füllkrug's second goal was ruled offside
